WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 

Apologies for my ineptitude, but I am unable to resolve the a similar to that posted by BlazingArdor on 28th December.

Having installed the extension I create Modern UI WPF Application, it builds but when I go to the mainwindow.xaml the line __Style="{StaticResource BlankWindow}"__ has en error with the 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' description.  I have tried a number of things to resolve (re-installing etc) but cannot resolve this issue.

Similar to this, when viewing the samples, they build but changing any other the styling options causes errors. 

Any help appreciated.

Thanks

Jack
